title: Add QR code generation + full-form auto-fill from scanned QR (editable) and share updated live link

requirements.text: Add a QR code generation capability that encodes the current form values (Name, Case Number, Crime Number, Forward Date) into a single scannable code using the exact pipe-delimited format: "Name|CaseNo|CrimeNo|Date".

quotes: Mai chahta hu ki jo bhi mai details de raha hu jaise  name case number crime number forward in sab ka ek barcode genrate ho jaye
Kripya yeh dono points confirm kar dein

acceptanceCriteria: A user can generate a scannable code from the form values Name, Case Number, Crime Number, and Forward Date.
The encoded string uses the exact delimiter and field order: Name|CaseNo|CrimeNo|Date.
All user-facing labels/buttons related to generating the code are in English.

requirements.text: When a QR code is scanned, parse the scanned value as "Name|CaseNo|CrimeNo|Date" and automatically populate the Name, Case Number, Crime Number, and Forward Date fields with the parsed values.

quotes: Ha barcode scan hote hi name ke coloum me name case number me case number aur aur date sab automatic feed ho jaye
scan hote hi Name, Case No, Crime No, Forward Date sab automatic fill ho jayein

acceptanceCriteria: Scanning a QR code encoded in the specified format fills all four fields: Name, Case Number, Crime Number, and Forward Date.
If the scanned value does not match the expected 4-part format, the existing behavior remains: treat the scanned value as the Case Number only (no crash).
The existing scan success beep continues to play on successful scan.

requirements.text: Ensure that after auto-fill from a scanned QR code, all populated fields remain editable so the user can correct mistakes before submitting "Add Record".

quotes: sara details feed hone ke baad edit ka bhi option rahe jisse koi mistek hone par edit Kiya ja sake

acceptanceCriteria: After a scan populates fields, the user can manually edit Name, Case Number, Crime Number, and Forward Date using the same input controls.
Edits made after auto-fill are the values submitted when the user clicks "Add Record".

requirements.text: After implementing and deploying the QR generation + full auto-fill feature, provide the user with the updated live website link to verify that everything works correctly.

quotes: Abhi kar ke web site ka link do mujhe mai chek karu sab thik h

acceptanceCriteria: A single, working URL to the updated deployed site is produced and shared after deployment.

constraints: Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add migration code if persistent state schema must change.
nonGoals: Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is allowed, but not requested here).
Adding external databases or any non-IC backend services.
